seo: wordpress,adaptive images,lfi漏洞,本地文件包含
summary: 检测wordpress的adaptive-images插件是否存在LFI（本地文件包含）漏洞，通过构造恶意请求读取wp-config.php文件内容验证漏洞是否存在
summary_en: Detect LFI (Local File Inclusion) vulnerability in the adaptive-images plugin for wordpress by constructing malicious requests to read the wp-config.php file content to verify the existence of the vulnerability
